**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 264 2.0 **Price** 20 gp **Usage** affixed to a weapon **Activate**([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32)) --- Dark smoke seems to writhe within this obsidian gem. When you activate the gem, make a melee Strike. If you hit and deal damage, the target is [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) 1, or frightened 2 on a critical hit.
If you have the [Intimidating Strike](/Feats.aspx?ID=368) feat, increase the frightened condition value caused by the Strike to frightened 2, or frightened 3 on a critical hit.
name: Fear Gem
